title: Battle Tank - 7 : Sound System for 2K22 Tunguska
description: Battle Tank - 7 Sound System is the result of the joint work of our experienced programmers and sound designers. More than 90 engine and weapon sounds of Russian 2K22 Tunguska with all the necessary code
longDescription:
VIDEO PREVIEW | HOW TO USE VIDEO | HOW TO USE IT FOR MULTIPLAYER


Immerse yourself in the thunderous symphony of modern warfare with the "Battle Tank - 7: Sound System for 2K22 Tunguska." This plugin, crafted in C++ using Unreal Engine blueprints, brings the fearsome 2K22 Tunguska (NATO reporting name: SA-19 Grison) to life with unparalleled auditory precision.


  • Fully controllable 3d-model
  • The most realistic engine sounds
  • Different sounds from different RPMs, speed, gear and other vehicle's parameters
  • Weapon sounds from the weapons used by this vehicle in real life
  • Different sounds from different distance
  • Startup and Shutdown sounds
  • Cockpit sounds
  • Multiplayer Replication


Designed for the most demanding AAA multiplayer shooters, Battle Tank - 7 sets a new standard in realism. Featuring an intricately modeled and controllable version of the legendary 2K22 Tunguska, this plugin delivers an immersive sound experience that responds dynamically to every in-game action and event.


Our extensive experience in sound production and original audio recordings ensures that 60 meticulously managed vehicle sounds and 30 weapon sounds for 2K22 Tunguska delivers a true-to-life audio experience, capturing every roar, bang, and blast with unparalleled accuracy. The engine roar changes in real-time, reflecting key parameters such as RPM, speed, and distance from the listener. The twin 30mm 2A38 cannons deliver a spine-chilling barrage, while the surface-to-air missiles and smoke grenade launchers unleash their fury with authentic audio fidelity.


2K22 Tunguska Sound System is built for seamless multiplayer integration. Every sound effect is fully replicated, ensuring that players experience consistent, high-quality audio in any multiplayer scenario.


The demo scene is already included in the plugin. You just need to adjust the audio settings of the project as shown in the 'How to Use' video.
technicalDetails:
Code Module:Â Tank_7_Sound_System (Runtime Module)

Number of Blueprints: 6

Number of C++ Classes: 6

Network Replicated: Yes

Supported Development Platforms: Windows

Supported Target Build Platforms: Windows


HOW TO USE IT WITH OUR READY-MADE SCENE: VIDEO

HOW TO USE IT FOR MULTIPLAYER: VIDEO

  • Enable "Tank_7_Sound_System" and "ChaosVehiclesPlugin" from "Edit > Plugins". Restart UE
  • Adjust the audio settings of the project as shown in the 'How to Use' video
  • Open 'DemoLevel' from '/Engine/Plugins/Tank_7_Sound_System Content/DemoLevel/DemoLevel.umap'.
  • DRIVE!!!


Check Tank_7_SFXComponent_BP to adjust any Tank's sound settings.


Support: info@soundfx.studio

Discord: https://discord.gg/HzVuvSuCHr
